column1: #Text=Union summit ended yesterday in Portugal with agreement on many global challenges but with differences on other key issues .

#Text=European and African Union leaders left the Portuguese capital expressing satisfaction for the most part with their first summit in seven years and what they called a new spirit in relations between the two continents .
#Text=The head of the European Commission , José Manuel Barroso , said they agreed that climate change probably represents the most important challenge of the 21st Century .
